lesson.title: Cryptographic Attestations
lesson.objective: Sign messages to prove ownership and intent

sections.content: Not every commitment requires gas. Signing a message with your wallet proves ownership without spending anything. This is how voting, commitments, and off-chain verification work.

When you sign an attestation, you're creating cryptographic proof of your intent. The message is tied to your wallet forever. It's a public declaration - I am here, I am committed, and this is my signature.

content: Signatures prove ownership without on-chain transactions
Attestations can be verified by anyone, anytime

questions.question: What is the benefit of signing messages vs. transactions?
